messages.title: My pledge to you
messages.content: Continue to work tirelessly for all our communities in Nottingham North. Ensure our NHS is fully funded so it is there when you need it. Work to build fifty thousand new homes in Nottingham Central/North including four thousand affordable homes. Lead the fight against crime and anti-social behaviour. Protect both green belt and the future of our city

messages.title: From Nottingham North to Number 10
messages.content: The issues and concerns of Nottingham North residents have been voiced directly to the policy makers and the most powerful person in the country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work to build fifty thousand new homes in Nottingham Central/North including four thousand affordable homes.
Ensure our NHS is fully funded so it is there when you need it.
Lead the fight against crime and anti-social behaviour.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting Green Belt and City Future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect both green belt and the future of our city.

issues.health: Ensure our NHS is fully funded so it is there when you need it.

housing.content: Work to build fifty thousand new homes in Nottingham Central/North including four thousand affordable homes.
